scripts.serve: npm run build && firebase emulators:start --only functions
scripts.test:integration: npm run build && node scripts/pick-ports.mjs && dotenv_config_path=.env.test node -r dotenv/config ./node_modules/.bin/firebase emulators:exec --config ../firebase.test.json --project demo-test --only firestore,auth,functions "dotenv_config_path=.env.test node -r dotenv/config ./node_modules/.bin/jest --config jest.config.js --runInBand --detectOpenHandles --forceExit"
scripts.test:gate: node scripts/pick-ports.mjs && dotenv_config_path=.env.test node -r dotenv/config ./node_modules/.bin/firebase emulators:exec --config ../firebase.test.json --project demo-test --only firestore,auth,functions "dotenv_config_path=.env.test node -r dotenv/config ./node_modules/.bin/jest --config jest.config.js --runInBand tests/contract tests/security tests/smoke --detectOpenHandles"
scripts.test: npm run test:integration && npm run test:gate
scripts.openapi:check: npm run openapi:print > current-spec.json && git diff --exit-code current-spec.json
